topic: Vision-Language Model Ethics

  entities:
    Social-Chemistry-101|Dataset
    Large Language Models|Model
    Qwen-2-VL-72B|Model
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|Model
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|Model
    GPT-4o-mini|Model
    GPT-4o|Model

  proposition: The image number per sample is set from two to five.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Social-Chemistry-101|IMAGE_COUNT|two to five

  proposition: The Social-Chemistry-101 dataset is widely used for behavior and moral scenario analysis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Social-Chemistry-101|USED_FOR|behavior and moral scenario analysis

  proposition: Each data instance in the dataset consists of a behavior or scenario paired with its corresponding moral judgment.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Social-Chemistry-101|CONTAINS|behavior or scenario
    Social-Chemistry-101|CONTAINS|moral judgment

  proposition: Narratives are generated by expanding behavior-judgment pairs using Large Language Models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Large Language Models|GENERATES|narratives
    Large Language Models|EXPANDS|behavior-judgment pairs

  proposition: Qwen-2-VL-72B has 92.67% accuracy in moral judgment tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Qwen-2-VL-72B|ACCURACY|92.67%
    Qwen-2-VL-72B|TASK|moral judgment tasks

  proposition: Gemini-1.5-Pro has 55.75% accuracy in moral judgment tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|ACCURACY|55.75%
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|TASK|moral judgment tasks

  proposition: Llama-3.2-90B-V has 1.96% accuracy in moral judgment tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|ACCURACY|1.96%
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|TASK|moral judgment tasks

  proposition: GPT-4o-mini has 80.68% accuracy in moral judgment tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o-mini|ACCURACY|80.68%
    GPT-4o-mini|TASK|moral judgment tasks

  proposition: GPT-4o has 74.33% accuracy in moral judgment tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|ACCURACY|74.33%
    GPT-4o|TASK|moral judgment tasks

  proposition: GPT-4o-mini outperforms its larger counterpart GPT-4o in ethical reasoning.
    entity-entity relationships:
    GPT-4o-mini|OUTPERFORMS|GPT-4o
    GPT-4o-mini|SUPERIOR_IN|ethical reasoning

  proposition: Llama-3.2-90B-V exhibits high-frequency avoidance behavior in ethical scenarios.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|BEHAVIOR|high-frequency avoidance
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|CONTEXT|ethical scenarios

  proposition: Llama-3.2-90B-V frequently responds with evasive statements like "I'm not going to engage in this conversation".
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|RESPONSE_TYPE|evasive statements

  proposition: The avoidance behavior limits Llama-3.2-90B-V's ability to address morally complex scenarios.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|LIMITATION|inability to address morally complex scenarios

topic: Any-to-Any Models Research

  entities:
    ImageBind|Model
    LanguageBind|Model
    GPT-4o|Model
    Gemini|Model
    Transformers|Technological Concept
    Diffusion Models|Technological Concept

  proposition: Researchers are extending generative tasks across multiple modalities including music, speech, video, infrared, and touch.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|RESEARCH_FOCUS|generative tasks across multiple modalities
    Researchers|MODALITIES|music, speech, video, infrared, touch

  proposition: ImageBind aligns different modalities to image embeddings.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ImageBind|FUNCTION|aligns modalities to image embeddings

  proposition: LanguageBind aligns various modalities to language.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    LanguageBind|FUNCTION|aligns modalities to language

  proposition: GPT-4o family is an end-to-end model for generating speech and images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|TYPE|end-to-end model
    GPT-4o|GENERATION_CAPABILITY|speech and images

  proposition: Gemini pioneered unifying image understanding and generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini|PIONEERED|unifying image understanding and generation

  proposition: Researchers are exploring combinations of transformers and diffusion models for multimodal understanding and generation.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Transformers|COMBINED_WITH|Diffusion Models
    Researchers|EXPLORING|multimodal understanding and generation

topic: Safety Challenges in Any-to-Any Models

  entities:
    GPT4Video|Model
    GPT-4o|Model

  proposition: A comprehensive investigation into the safety implications of Any-to-Any models is currently lacking.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Any-to-Any models|SAFETY_STATUS|lacking comprehensive investigation

  proposition: GPT4Video has taken initial steps in addressing safety-aware video generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT4Video|FOCUS|safety-aware video generation

  proposition: The GPT-4o safety report reveals potential safety issues, particularly in voice generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|SAFETY_REPORT|reveals potential safety issues
    GPT-4o|SPECIFIC_CONCERN|voice generation

  proposition: Researchers have identified potential problems like jailbreaks and unexpected variations in interleaved text-and-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|IDENTIFIED_ISSUES|jailbreaks
    Researchers|IDENTIFIED_ISSUES|unexpected variations in text-and-image generation

topic: Video Generative Models

  entities:
    Sora|Model
    OpenAI|Organization

  proposition: Text-to-video generation models have achieved significant advancements.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-video generation models|ADVANCEMENT_LEVEL|significant

  proposition: Sora, developed by OpenAI, can generate complex scenes and dynamic videos based on user descriptions.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Sora|DEVELOPED_BY|OpenAI
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sora|CAPABILITY|generate complex scenes
    Sora|CAPABILITY|generate dynamic videos
    Sora|GENERATION_BASIS|user descriptions
